Ezzat El Alaili (Arabic) (15 Septemba 1934 - 5 Febụwarị 2021) bụ onye Ijipt na-eme ihe nkiri nke mere ihe nkiri 300, usoro TV, na ihe nkiri ihe nkiri kemgbe afọ 1960. O nwetara nzere bachelọ ya na Higher Institute of Theatre Studies n'afọ 1960.
O ritere ihe nrite nke ndụ ya site na Dubai International Film Festival n'afọ 2015

A kwanyeere ya ugwu na Sharjah International Book Fair "maka enyemaka ya dị ịrịba ama na ihe nkiri Egypt n'ime ọtụtụ iri afọ na nkọwa ya dị elu nke akwụkwọ akụkọ Egypt na Arabic kachasị mma site na nnukwu nchịkọta  nkiri na usoro TV".
